title: Make YES celebration fireworks clearly visible (fix tiny-dot/black-screen issue)

requirements.text: Fix the fireworks visibility so that after clicking the "YES" button, the fireworks are clearly visible (not tiny faint dots) across common desktop and mobile screens by correcting particle opacity/lifespan logic and increasing perceived brightness/size as needed.

quotes: fireworks pyaary ho na yar ye to nzr hi ni aa rhy choty choty sy dots lack screen pr

acceptanceCriteria: On clicking "YES", fireworks appear as clearly visible bursts (not barely-visible dots) on both light and dark portions of the UI.
Particle alpha/opacity is not near-zero at the start of a burst (fireworks are bright immediately, then fade out smoothly).
Fireworks remain visible without requiring the user to change screen brightness or environment lighting.

requirements.text: Adjust the fireworks canvas rendering so it does not look like a solid black screen overlay; ensure the overlay remains visually transparent while still allowing trails/glow effects (if used), and keep the YES message and image readable beneath the fireworks.

quotes: choty choty sy dots lack screen pr

acceptanceCriteria: During fireworks, the canvas overlay does not present as a full black screen; underlying content remains clearly visible.
Fireworks do not reduce the readability of the YES celebration text or obscure the couple image.

requirements.text: Maintain smooth performance by keeping the existing mobile performance scaling behavior, and ensure the animation cleans up correctly when fireworks stop (no continuing intervals/animations after the 10-second celebration window).

acceptanceCriteria: On mobile devices, the fireworks effect remains smooth (no obvious stutter) and does not cause the page to become unresponsive.
After the celebration ends, CPU usage returns to normal and the fireworks overlay stops rendering (no lingering timers/animations).

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui (shadcn/ui sources).
Keep changes limited to the existing React frontend; no backend changes are required for this request.
nonGoals: Adding new celebration types (confetti, sound effects, etc.) beyond improving the existing fireworks visibility.
Changing the 10-second fireworks duration unless needed to fix the visibility/overlay issue.
